name: Al-Ankabut
description:
Inspired by the teachings of The Most Honorable Elijah Muhammad and the 29th Chapter of the Holy Qur'an, Al-'Ankabut is an educational action adventure game that involves the hunt for the frailest of houses, the spider’s house. Throughout this epic journey, the player is tested with mathematical challenges and taught wisdom from the holy book—all in a quest to save the misguided people and uncover the mystery of the spider.

Explore a vast and diverse world.

Al-'Ankabut sets players in a metaphorical version of the West Bank and allows them to explore to their heart's content. They'll be able to meet the inhabitants of various cities, learn of their personal struggles, and offer guidance as a servant of the sure truth.

Use math to overcome the trials of the spider.

Mathematics is the foundation of civilization. Become a master of mathematics and solve problems in dynamic and intriguing trials!

Discover the collectibles!

Al-'Ankabut uses scripture, science, and mathematics to enrich the world and enlighten the players on the value of the many scriptures found in the Bible and Holy Qur'an. It provides a comprehensive experience of the studies of the world.
